mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, password, user_name, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day, address_1, address_2, address_3, post_code, signflag, social_id, phone) values(#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{birthYear}, #{birthMonth}, #{birthDay}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{postCode}, #{signflag}, #{socialId}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select * from user where social_id = #{id} and signflag = #{signflag} and is_del = 'N'
select * from user where user_id = #{userId} and signflag = #{signFlagDefault} and is_del = 'N'
select * from user where user_id = #{username} and signflag = 0 and is_del = 'N'
